comments:
An NPE occurs when using the help.buildHelpIndex task.  To reproduce:

1.  Check out org.eclipse.platform.doc.isv
2.  Execute the build.index target in the buildDoc.xml script.  Ensure that "Run in hte same JRE as the workspace" is selected.  Run with the argument "-debug" to get verbose output (Main tab).

BUILD FAILED
D:\workspace\org.eclipse.platform.doc.isv\buildDoc.xml:17: java.lang.NullPointerException

The recent changes in this method failed to handle the case where 'luceneVersion' is null (which is the case when the index is missing).

The trivial fix is to return false at the top of the method for the 'null' case.

Fixed.
I still see this error in my workspace with I2005121506. Also, the same error, exists by adding the new plugins to basebuilder and running a releng style build
Sonia, Kim, are you still seeing this? We have not been able to reproduce.
